org.numenta.nupic.datagen

Class SequenceMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.numenta.nupic.datagen.SequenceMachine

  • public class SequenceMachine
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for generating and manipulating sequences, for use in experimentation and tests.
    Author:
    David Ray
